mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_violation (tvis_json_id, vehs_idx, camera_id, hphm, csys, clpp, ppcx, cxnk, psfx, clwz, wzlx, cllxzfl, category, tvis_json_tbl, create_time) VALUES (#{tvisJsonId}, #{vehsIdx}, #{cameraId}, #{hphm}, #{csysName}, #{clppName}, #{ppcxName}, #{cxnkName}, #{psfx}, #{clwz}, #{wzlx}, #{vtype}, #{category}, #{tblName}, #{date})
mapper.select: SELECT tv.tvis_json_id, ts.site_name, tv.clpp, tv.ppcx, tv.hphm, tv.wzlx, tvt.violation_type_name, tv.create_time, tv.tvis_json_tbl FROM t_violation tv LEFT JOIN t_camera tc ON tv.camera_id = tc.camera_id LEFT JOIN t_site ts ON tc.site_id = ts.site_id LEFT JOIN t_violation_type tvt ON tv.wzlx = tvt.violation_type_code ORDER BY tv.create_time DESC LIMIT 2
